item.description:
You are registered just by signing up here. Please be a good RSVPer 'cuz Nerd Fun is on the hook for 20 people at 6pm.
Training is at 6pm.
Dinner (redbones) is provided.

Dress for this event will be business casual, and dinner will be provided. Directions to the station, located at One Guest Street in Brighton, are available on our website, should you need them: http://www.wgbh.org/a....

Tuesday, August 24, 6-11pm

from WGBH: Weâ€™re seeking computer literate and customer-service savvy volunteers to answer phones and take pledges during this drive. Dinner and training will be provided during all shifts, and volunteers will receive a complimentary one-year membership to WGBH to keep or give to a friend or family member.
item.name: Volunteer at WGBH answering phones and taking pledges
